languages.text: "Да-да, ваша с ними вражда общеизвестна... Но можно посмотреть на нее иначе. На Веабос-6 вы встретились с архонтом могучего кабала — чье присутствие там уже само по себе странно, — и выжили. Впоследствии вы неоднократно сталкивались с ее ближайшими прихвостнями — и вновь уцелели. Ваша столица пала жертвой коварной атаки, но и тут кинжалы убийц разминулись с вашим сердцем".

"Yes, yes, the enmity between you is a known fact... But there is another way to look at it. On Vheabos VI, you met the Archon of a mighty Kabal — whose presence there seems strange to begin with — and lived. You subsequently encountered a number of her closest henchmen — yet, again, you survived. Your capital fell victim to a nefarious attack, but even this time their daggers missed your heart."
languages.original_text: "Да-да, ваша с ними вражда общеизвестна... Но можно посмотреть на нее иначе. На Веабос-6 вы встретились с архонтом могучего кабала — чье присутствие там уже само по себе странно, — и выжили. Впоследствии вы неоднократно сталкивались с ее ближайшими прихвостнями — и вновь уцелели. Ваша столица пала жертвой коварной атаки, но и тут кинжалы убийц разминулись с вашим сердцем".

You subsequently encountered a number of her closest henchmen — yet, again, you survived. Your capital fell victim to a nefarious attack, but even this time their daggers missed your heart."

On Vheabos-VI, you met the Archon of a mighty Kabal — whose presence there seems strange to begin with — and lived. You subsequently encountered a number of her closest henchmen — yet, again, you survived. Your capital fell victim to a nefarious attack, but even this time their daggers missed your heart."

You subsequently encountered a number of her closest henchmen — yet, again, you survived. Your capital fell victim to a nefarious attack, but even this time their daggers missed your heart."

On Vheabos VI, you met the Archon of a mighty Kabal — whose presence there seems strange to begin with — and lived. You subsequently encountered a number of her closest henchmen — yet, again, you survived. Your capital fell victim to a nefarious attack, but even this time their daggers missed your heart."

languages.text: 「そのとおり、お前たちの間の憎しみは周知の事実だ…だが、別の見方もある。ヴィアボス・VIで巨大な陰謀団のアーコンと遭遇しただろう。奴がいるとは最初から妙だったが…そこでお前は生還した。その後、アーコンの側近と何人も遭遇したが、再び生き延びた。お前の首都は邪悪な襲撃の犠牲となったが、今回も奴らのダガーはお前の心臓を避けた」
languages.original_text: "Yes, yes, the enmity between you is a known fact... But there is another way to look at it. On Vheabos VI, you met the Archon of a mighty Kabal — whose presence there seems strange to begin with — and lived. You subsequently encountered a number of her closest henchmen — yet, again, you survived. Your capital fell victim to a nefarious attack, but even this time their daggers missed your heart."

traits.locale_text: 「そのとおり、お前たちの間の憎しみは周知の事実だ…だが、別の見方もある。ヴィーボスⅥで巨大な陰謀団のアーコンと遭遇しただろう――奴がいるとは最初から妙だったが――そこでお前は生還した。その後、アーコンの側近と何人も遭遇した――が、再び生き延びた。お前の首都は邪悪な襲撃の犠牲となったが、今回も奴らのダガーはお前の心臓を避けた」

languages.original_text: "Yes, yes, the enmity between you is a known fact... But there is another way to look at it. On Vheabos VI, you met the Archon of a mighty Kabal — whose presence there seems strange to begin with — and lived. You subsequently encountered a number of her closest henchmen — yet, again, you survived. Your capital fell victim to a nefarious attack, but even this time their daggers missed your heart."

languages.text: “好了，好了，我知道你们之间有一笔血海深仇……不过，你可以再好好想想。在维博斯六号星上，你遇到了大阴谋团的执政官，可你却活了下来。至于那位执政官为什么会出现在那里，这本身就是一个疑问。后来，你又遇到了她的几名心腹，但你依然幸免于难。到最后，虽然他们来势汹汹地袭击了你的首都，可还是给你留了一条命。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, yes, the enmity between you is a known fact... But there is another way to look at it. On Vheabos VI, you met the Archon of a mighty Kabal — whose presence there seems strange to begin with — and lived. You subsequently encountered a number of her closest henchmen — yet, again, you survived. Your capital fell victim to a nefarious attack, but even this time their daggers missed your heart."

traits.locale_text: “好了，好了，我知道你们之间有一笔血海深仇……不过，你可以再好好想想。在维博斯六号星上，你遇到了大阴谋团的执政官，可你却活了下来。至于那位执政官为什么会出现在那里，这本身就是一个疑问。后来，你又遇到了她的几名心腹，但你依然幸免于难。到最后，虽然他们来势汹汹地袭击了你的首都，可还是给你留了一条命。”

languages.text: «Sí, sí, la enemistad que les une es de sobra conocida... pero se podría interpretar de otra manera. En Vheabos VI, se encontró con la Arconte de una poderosa Kábala, alguien cuya presencia en el lugar ya resulta de por sí extraña, y sobrevivió. Posteriormente se encontró con varios de sus adláteres más peligrosos... y a pesar de todo sigue viv{mf|o|a}. Su capital cayó víctima de un siniestro ataque, y ni por esas lograron acabar con usted».
languages.original_text: "Yes, yes, the enmity between you is a known fact... But there is another way to look at it. On Vheabos VI, you met the Archon of a mighty Kabal — whose presence there seems strange to begin with — and lived. You subsequently encountered a number of her closest henchmen — yet, again, you survived. Your capital fell victim to a nefarious attack, but even this time their daggers missed your heart."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, sí, la enemistad que les une es de sobra conocida... pero se podría interpretar de otra manera. En Vheabos VI, se encontró con la Arconte de una poderosa Kábala, alguien cuya presencia en el lugar ya resulta de por sí extraña, y sobrevivió. Posteriormente se encontró con varios de sus adláteres más peligrosos... y a pesar de todo sigue viv{mf|o|a}. Su capital cayó víctima de un siniestro ataque, y ni por esas lograron acabar con usted».

languages.text: « Oui, oui, toute la galaxie est au courant de l'inimité qui vous oppose... Mais il y a une autre façon de voir les choses. Sur Vhéabos-VI, vous êtes {mf|sorti vivant|sortie vivante} d'une rencontre avec l'archonte d'une puissante Kabale, dont la présence sur cette planète reste à ce jour inexpliquée. Vous avez ensuite croisé la route d'un certain nombre de ses sbires les plus fidèles, mais encore une fois, vous avez survécu. Votre capitale même a été attaquée, et pourtant, leurs dagues n'ont toujours pas trouvé un chemin jusqu'à votre cœur. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, yes, the enmity between you is a known fact... But there is another way to look at it. On Vheabos VI, you met the Archon of a mighty Kabal — whose presence there seems strange to begin with — and lived. You subsequently encountered a number of her closest henchmen — yet, again, you survived. Your capital fell victim to a nefarious attack, but even this time their daggers missed your heart."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, oui, toute la galaxie est au courant de l'inimité qui vous oppose... Mais il y a une autre façon de voir les choses. Sur Vhéabos-VI, vous êtes {mf|sorti vivant|sortie vivante} d'une rencontre avec l'archonte d'une puissante Kabale, dont la présence sur cette planète reste à ce jour inexpliquée. Vous avez ensuite croisé la route d'un certain nombre de ses sbires les plus fidèles, mais encore une fois, vous avez survécu. Votre capitale même a été attaquée, et pourtant, leurs dagues n'ont toujours pas trouvé un chemin jusqu'à votre cœur. »

languages.text: "Ja, ja, die Feindschaft zwischen Euch ist allgemein bekannt ... Aber es gibt auch eine andere Sichtweise. Auf Vheabos VI habt Ihr die Archontin einer mächtigen Kabale getroffen – deren Anwesenheit dort bereits seltsam war – und überlebt. Anschließend kam es zum Kontakt mit einigen ihrer engsten Gefolgsleute – und wieder habt Ihr überlebt. Eure Hauptstadt fiel einem hinterhältigen Angriff zum Opfer, aber auch diesmal verfehlten die Dolche Euer Herz."
languages.original_text: "Yes, yes, the enmity between you is a known fact... But there is another way to look at it. On Vheabos VI, you met the Archon of a mighty Kabal — whose presence there seems strange to begin with — and lived. You subsequently encountered a number of her closest henchmen — yet, again, you survived. Your capital fell victim to a nefarious attack, but even this time their daggers missed your heart."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, ja, die Feindschaft zwischen Euch ist allgemein bekannt ... Aber es gibt auch eine andere Sichtweise. Auf Vheabos VI habt Ihr die Archontin einer mächtigen Kabale getroffen – deren Anwesenheit dort bereits seltsam war – und überlebt. Anschließend kam es zum Kontakt mit einigen ihrer engsten Gefolgsleute – und wieder habt Ihr überlebt. Eure Hauptstadt fiel einem hinterhältigen Angriff zum Opfer, aber auch diesmal verfehlten die Dolche Euer Herz."

languages.text: "Evet evet, aranızdaki husumet bilinen bir gerçek ancak buna farklı bir açıdan da bakılabilir. Vheabos VI'da kudretli bir Kabal'ın Arkon'uyla karşılaştın. Onun orada olması başlı başına tuhafken bu karşılaşman sağ çıktın. Ardından en yakın adamlarıyla yüzleştin ve yine sağ kaldın. Başkentin hain bir saldırıya kurban gitti ancak onda bile hançerler kalbini isabet ettirmeyi başaramadı."
languages.original_text: "Yes, yes, the enmity between you is a known fact... But there is another way to look at it. On Vheabos VI, you met the Archon of a mighty Kabal — whose presence there seems strange to begin with — and lived. You subsequently encountered a number of her closest henchmen — yet, again, you survived. Your capital fell victim to a nefarious attack, but even this time their daggers missed your heart."

traits.locale_text: "Evet, evet, aranızdaki husumet bilinen bir gerçek ancak buna farklı bir açıdan da bakılabilir. Vheabos VI'da kudretli bir Kabal'ın Arkon'uyla karşılaştın, ki onun orada olması başlı başına tuhaf zaten, bu karşılaşmada da hayatta kaldın. Ardından en yakın adamlarıyla yüzleştin ve hayatta kalmayı yine başardın. Başkentin hain bir saldırıya kurban gitti ancak onda bile hançerler kalbini isabet ettirmeyi başaramadı."
